articles.title: What did we do on holiday break? A toilet paper pyramid
articles.description: MIDLAND, Mich. (AP) — It's not what the Egyptians had in mind but it worked: A group of Michigan high school students made a pyramid out of toilet paper — 27,434 rolls.
articles.content:
MIDLAND, Mich. (AP) It's not what the Egyptians had in mind but it worked: A group of Michigan high school students made a pyramid out of toilet paper 27,434 rolls.
